page.title: 20Health 2
page.content: {Oadby House_}this is the Community Care Centre and it is used by all the local practices.There are 3 District Nurses and Midwives,1 State Enrolled Nurse and 2 Health Visitors.The District Nurses/Midwives look after the dressing of wounds,injections and women who are expecting babies.The Health Visitors look after young babies and advise their mothers on how to look after them.They also visit the elderly and generally educate people in healthy living. There are clinics at Oadby House_{Ante {natal Classes,A Baby Clinic,A {Paediatric Clinic}and clinics for { {Senior Citizens.} Equipment needed for sick patients such as wheel chairs,ripple beds and walking frames can be obtained from here.
